Uses of Package
com.cmt3319.game

Classes in com.cmt3319.game used by com.cmt3319.game
Arrow
          Places a selectable arrow on screen.
Assets
          Singleton used to store all assets used in game, including images and audio.
Cloud
          Draws a cloud on screen and provides necessary methods to move across the screen, and to check if it is still on screen.
CloudManager
          Manages a list of Cloud.
GamePlayScreen.GameState
           
Map
          Creates and draws world based on TileSet and Tile and is responsible for dealing with collisions with tilemaps and Player.
MovingObject
          Represents the player and enemies in the game.
Player
          Extends MovingObject and introduces animation.
Score
          Draws score on screen during game play.
Settings
          Holds a number of settings for the game including: if sound is enabled, high score, and if gravity is reversed.
Tile
          Represents a tile on screen.
Tile.TileID
           
TileSet
          Holds the tilesets used by Map.
